name: LPG Filling Station
description:
1. LPG Filling Plant Project

The whole Filling Plant consists of one half-automatic Filling Carousel Type K24E with 24 Filling Machines, chain conveyor with pneumatic equipment for the transport of empty and filled bottles and as a connection between auxilliary equipment for the Weight Check, Filled Weight Correction, Leak Testing and Shrinking of plastic sleeves by means of hot air. Leaky bottles are evacuated by means of an Evacuation Unit.
The Filling station is intended for the filling and handling of bottles with 12 kg filling weight with 22mm click-on self-closing vertikal valves. The connection and disconnection of the filling heads occurs automatically.
The capacity of filling carousel is approx. 1000 bottles per hour.
Total quantity 7000 bottles a day in 7 effective hours. The filling will occur in one shift. The data over the filled bottle will be sent to the computer, collected and evaluated by means of a program pack.

2. Electronic Filling Carousel Type K24E

for installation on the ground, consisting of:
- Revolving platform, built as circular disc, outside
diameter 6300 mm, for max. 24 filling scales
- Central column, to carry the revolving platform incl.
a generously dimensioned live-ring ball bearing
- Ring distribution conduit for compressed air with
24 pcs. connecting branches
- Ring distribution conduit for LPG with 24 pcs.
connecting branchs, material with AZ 3.1 acc. to EN 10204
with pressure and tightness testing WAZ 2.2 acc. to EN 10204
- Swivel joint for compressed air and el. current,
ex-proof (connection from above) DN 25, PN 10
- Swivel joint for LPG (connection from below),
DN 100, PN 40 with AZ acc. DIN 50.049-3.1
- 24 pcs. shut-off valves for compressed air, DN 6, PN 10
- 24 pcs. shut-off valves for LPG, DN 10, PN 40
with AZ acc. to DIN 50.049-3.1
- 24 set fixing angle to fix the filling scales on the
revolving platform in each position
Painting: blue

accuracy class 3

Power supply :

- frequency: 50-60 Hz
- consumption: 7/46 W

**************

Data transfer of filling data from the scale to PC only wireless

scale calibrated, ready for operation

(classified as Zone 1).
